subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: In 2010, N.H.L. enforcer Derek Boogaard signed a multimillion dollar contract with the New York Rangers. But, nobody predicted how far and how fast the Boogeyman would fall.
snippet: In 2010, N.H.L. enforcer Derek Boogaard signed a multimillion dollar contract with the New York Rangers. But, nobody predicted how far and how fast the Boogeyman would fall.
